// src/components/MyOnlyGirl.js // My Only Girl page view import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../assets/styles/main2.css'; import Footer from './Footer'; import Header from './Header'; const image = require('../assets/images/photo3.JPG'); function MyOnlyGirl() { // no body border for this page document.body.style.border = 'none'; useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const scrollTop = window.scrollY; const maxScroll = document.body.scrollHeight - window.innerHeight; const scale = 4.4; // so that we can acheive the desired effect faster const minOpacity = 0.05; // minimum opacity value that I want const newOpacity = Math.max( minOpacity, 1 - Math.min((scrollTop / maxScroll) * scale, 1) ); const imageElement = document.querySelector('.poem-container img'); if (imageElement) { imageElement.style.opacity = newOpacity; // assigning the new opacity } // for h1 title with id poem-title const textShadow = '1px 1px 0px white, -1px 1px 0px white, 1px -1px 0px white, -1px -1px 0px white'; const titleElement = document.getElementById('poem-title'); if (titleElement) { titleElement.style.textShadow = newOpacity > 0.95 ? textShadow : 'none'; } // if opacity is less than 0.2, set the text in direction-text to ' ' const directionTextElement = document.getElementById('direction-text'); if (directionTextElement) { directionTextElement.style.opacity = newOpacity > 0.4 ? 1 : 0; } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (

Scroll Up ↑

My Only Girl

My Only Girl | August 2024

She said, “It’s crazy that you pulled a girl like me.”
silent.
I just stared at midnight,
gleaming with the moonlight.

A curious boy found a dangerous mind mid-January.
beat.
I just stared in her eyes.
Timing is a good time.



Then, I guess life took over.
All just went straight into a…tornado.
beat.
Life on the stage of a circus show
I hung on a thread and she let go.
Then, just before I crushed my bones,
Come saving me was my only girl.
beat.
Life on the voyage in the seven seas
I ignored the stars so you stayed with me.
I created fake Gods and crafted beliefs.
Just so I can make sense of keeping you with me.


pause.


When she grabbed my hand and took me places,
I snapped on the hook and handed her the leash.

When she pulled me onto the thin ice of a frozen river,
I swore that I would die, but also felt the most alive.

When she first saw me cry over the phone one summer night,
She wrote me a letter and mailed it to me.

When she confessed that another man got her down on her knees,
I joked and said,
“I’m down to share if it will make you stay with me.”

When she took my first kiss without asking me first,
the moment she pulled back,
beat.
I had fallen in love.

I was in love.
Falling in love.

I was in love.
Falling in love.

I was in love...
with falling in love.


Until life took over.
And. All. Just. Went. Straight. Into. A… Tornado.
beat.
Life on the stage of a circus show
I hung on a thread and she let go.
Then, just before I crushed my bones,
Come saving me was my only girl.
beat.
Life on the voyage in the seven seas
I ignored the stars so you stayed with me.
I created fake Gods and crafted beliefs.
Just so I can make sense of keeping you with me.

She said, “It’s crazy that you pulled a girl like me.”
silent.














); }; export default MyOnlyGirl;
